output.sentences: The kids were enjoying playing in the bounce houses.
It was a special day as some soldiers were able to join in on the fun.
The kids loved jumping in the bounce houses while the soldiers watched.
The soldiers got to join the children on the inflatable obstacle course.
The soldiers finished the day by playing a lovely song with their instruments.
